title: Dartmouth: the Royal Navy College
creator_credit: Spectator Productions, Ivan Scott and Michael Hankinson
brief_description: The training of the navy cadets in the English Navy - these young boys join the navy cadets at the age of 13.1/2 years. Each cadet gets a shilling a week pocket money.
